Message.Title: Obama threatens to sue Navy seal for telling truth
Message.Msg: Navy seal writes a book "No Easy Day" telling how Bin Laden was killed. His details contradict the blatant lies that Obama told in order to steal credit and gain popular approval. (that is pretty sad isnt it?) In a letter obtained by Reuters, and subsequently released by the Pentagon, the Pentagon's top attorney said the Department of Defense was also considering legal action against anyone "acting in concert" with the author. It hinted that the book's royalties might be subject to government claims. This is the response after the book and after US Navy SEALs in April, both active and retired, have bashed President Obama for celebrating his supposed “gutsy call,” adding that he was using them as “ammunition” in his presidential re-election campaign. This story not on Yahoo but is national news. I don't understand why Yahoo is ignoring this news.

Message.Title: new bds could hurt yahoo
Message.Msg: There is so much wrong with the format one doesn't know where to begin.... Topic.Title: Every stock I own was up today except this

Message.Msg: amazing. YHOO would easily be at $17 w/ the rally - it was finally confronting the $16 resistance and actually working it's way through it before the #$%$ #$%$ CEO issued the the filing re: the $ procedes - it makes no sense, absolutely no sense for them to do that when they did it - it's unreal. I've spoken to friends on the research side and they were scratching their heads as to why the h*ck would YHOO issue a 'kill my stock' filing when they could have done it way down the road, and in conjunction with some other catalytic event like the YJapan sale. . . . This is pure arrogance. Mayer, Yang, Zuckerwankerberg - - your neighbor elitist silicon valley "I know how to build a company" arrogance and I own the company not shareholder mentality. Where the F*&)_ is LOEB??? Where the Heck is LOEB?
